item.title: “EXPERT-J” (“EXcellence Program for Engaging Research Talent – Japan”) is now open and accepting applications from Japanese universities.

The Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology has accounced that it will support hosting excellent young researchers, etc. from overseas through the urgent use of the 10-trillion-yen University Endowment Fund.
Release of a video message from the Japanese Minister of State for Science and Technology Policy to researchers around the world
